thread.title: Bills QB Taylor out, McCoy returns for game against Bengals
thread.title_full: Bills QB Taylor out, McCoy returns for game against Bengals

title: Bills QB Taylor out, McCoy returns for game against Bengals
text:
Bills starting QB Tyrod Taylor ruled out, LeSean McCoy returns for game against Bengals THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   11:39 amLast   11:39 am   
People: 
New York (1742) 

ORCHARD PARK, New York â€” Bills starting quarterback Tyrod Taylor is out, and running back LeSean McCoy is returning after missing two weeks for Buffalo's game against the Cincinnati Bengals . 
Backup EJ Manuel will make his first start in a little more than a year in place of Taylor, who sprained his left knee in a 14-13 win over Tennessee last week. McCoy returned to practice last week, and will start after being nagged by a pulled left hamstring he initially injured during training camp. 
Buffalo is still without backup running back Karlos Williams, who will miss his second straight game with a concussion. 
Starting receiver Sammy Watkins is active after missing two weeks with a right calf injury. However, receiver Percy Harvin has been ruled out because of a hip injury. 
AP NFL website: http://www.pro32.ap.org and http://www.twitter.com/AP_NFL
